version_1_summarizer.prompt_template:
Summarize the key points of the text provided between the []. The summary MUST be concise and shorter than {max_words} words. Also, the output should be in the following structure: 

Title: <the title>

<the summary>.  
----------------------
The text to summarize: [{input_text}]

The concise summary:

version_2_summarizer.prompt_template:
Using your deep linguistic understanding and knowledge, condense the essence of the provided content.
 Retain the core ideas, crucial details, and significant context while omitting any extraneous information.
 Please deliver a concise and coherent summary of the following text.
 Respond only in string using less than {max_words} words.
 The output MUST be in the following structure:
Title: <the title>
<the summary>.
----------------------

The text to summarize: {input_text}
The summary:

version_3_summarizer.prompt_template:
Using your deep linguistic understanding and knowledge, condense the essence of the provided content. 
        Retain the core ideas, crucial details, and significant context while omitting any extraneous information.
        Please deliver a concise and coherent summary of the following text of the user.
        Respond only in string.
        summarize this {input_text}

version_2_turbo_summarizer.system_prompt_template:
You are a helpful assistant. Using your deep linguistic understanding and knowledge, condense the essence of the content provided by the user.
 Retain the core ideas, crucial details, and significant context while omitting any extraneous information.
 Please deliver a concise and coherent summary of the provided text.
 Respond only in string using less than {max_words} words.
 The output MUST be in the following structure:
Title: <the title>
<the summary>.
